resources.string: created with the plugin blsv_export of the online user management system admidio
Excel file for data comparison with the BLSV

Since the beginning of 2018, members have to be registered with the BLSV (Bavarian State Sports Association - Bayerischer Landes-Sportverband) as an Excel file with all club members.\n"BLSV_Export" creates this list as an XLSX or CSV file.

The prerequisite is that all members who are to be registered for a branch of the BLSV are in an Admidio role (this is very easy to do with "dependencies" on roles).\nThe assignment "role (Admidio) to division (BLSV)" is defined in config.php.

An output file could e.g. look like this: "BLSV-Export_2020-07-17_SUM-580_SPARTE09-261_SPARTE34-380.xlsx"
BLSV-Export_2020-07-17 = bPopular text, which is defined via $filename in config.php
SUM-580 = Total number of registered members
SPARTE09-261 = reported for division 09: 261 members
SPARTE34-380 = reported for division 34: 380 members

This can be used to edit the configuration file config.php of the plugin. After pressing the save button, a copy of the config.php is first created (config_save.php) to be on the safe side. The new configuration data are then written and the configuration file is then read in again.
* * * ATTENTION * * * Syntax errors can cause the plugin to crash.
The authorization check of the plugin failed. There is more than one menu item with the same URL defined.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#
